name: pnp-list-formatting-bar-option-picker
title: Bar Option Picker
shortDescription: This sample displays a bar with multiple options. When an option on the bar is clicked, the Value column is updated to the corresponding value (0-4) using setValue.
longDescription: This sample displays a bar with multiple options. When an option on the bar is clicked, the Value column is updated to the corresponding value (0-4) using setValue.

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
